# predict.yachts — Yachts & Luxury Marine Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for yachts & luxury marine. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.yachts is a prediction market platform focused on yachts & luxury marine. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Yachts & Luxury Marine prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.yachts)
- [Markets — Active yachts & luxury marine prediction markets](https://predict.yachts#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, yachts & luxury marine, betting, odds, forecast, predict.yachts
